CustomField.formula:
IF(Propriedade_da_conta__c == 'PRIVADO' || Propriedade_da_conta__c == '', IF(TEXT(StageName) = 'COMITED', Amount, IF(TEXT(StageName) = 'WIN', 0, IF(TEXT(StageName) = 'UPSIDE HIGH', Amount * 0.35, IF(TEXT(StageName) = 'UPSIDE', Amount * 0.2, IF(TEXT(StageName) = 'OPEN', Amount * 0.1, Amount* 0))))),
IF(Propriedade_da_conta__c == 'PUBLICO' || Propriedade_da_conta__c == 'FILANTROPIA', IF(TEXT(StageName) = 'WIN', 0, IF(TEXT(StageName) = 'COMITED' && TEXT(Sub_Fase__c) != 'GARANTIDO', Amount * 0.4, IF(TEXT(StageName) = 'COMITED' && TEXT(Sub_Fase__c) = 'GARANTIDO', Amount , IF(TEXT(StageName) = 'UPSIDE HIGH', Amount * 0.2, IF(TEXT(StageName) = 'UPSIDE', Amount * 0.1, IF(TEXT(StageName) = 'OPEN', Amount * 0, Amount * 0)))))), null) )
CustomField.label: Forecast
